questions.question: Robert Hooke published his observations in a book called _______.
questions.explanation: Robert Hooke published his observations related to the discovery of cell in his scientific book called Micrographia.

questions.question: Which of the following types of microscopes has a single lens?
questions.explanation: A simple microscope is made up of a single lens.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT relevant to boiling?
questions.explanation: Boiling is not a surface phenomenon. It involves all the particles of a liquid and hence is a bulk phenomenon.

questions.question: The kinetic energy of the particles __________ with temperature.

options.option_4: No relation between temperature and kinetic energy

questions.explanation: When the temperature of the matter increases, it gets added up to the kinetic energy of its particles.

questions.question: The branch that deals with the cause of motion and the motion of an object is _______.
questions.explanation: The branch that deals with the cause of motion and the motion of an object is Dynamics.

questions.question: The normal and the SI units of temperature are ________ and _______ respectively.
questions.explanation: Temperature can be measured normally in either Celsius or Fahrenheit but the SI unit is Kelvin.

questions.question: Robert Hooke published his observations in a book called _______.
questions.explanation: Robert Hooke published his observations related to the discovery of cell in his scientific book called Micrographia.

questions.question: Which of the following types of microscopes has a single lens?
questions.explanation: A simple microscope is made up of a single lens.
